metadata.title: CVE-2020-3810 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Missing input validation in the ar/tar implementations of APT beforeversion 2.1.2 could result in denial of service when processing speciallycrafted deb files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-3810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apt - 2.0.2ubuntu0.1
apt-transport-https - 2.0.2ubuntu0.1
apt-utils - 2.0.2ubuntu0.1
libapt-pkg6.0 - 2.0.2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.2ubuntu0.1').
